name: TheNewarkPostandNewarkPostOnlinecom
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Newark Post and NewarkPostOnline.com skill delivers the latest news headlines from Newark, Delaware. With featured stories, local and sports news, and features feeds available, you will be able to customize the headlines read to you every week.

To Enable the Skill: click the enable button on The Newark Post and NewarkPostOnline.com skill page. The Featured news feed will be enabled by default. Enable local, sports or relaxer news feeds in your Alexa app by choosing Skills > Your Skills > The Newark Post and NewarkPostOnline.com > Manage in Flash Briefing. You can enable feeds that are currently “Off,” and “Edit Order” of feeds.

To Get Started: say "Alexa, what’s my Flash Briefing" or “Alexa, what’s in the news?” 

When the headlines are playing, you can say "Alexa, next" or Alexa, previous" to play the next or previous headline. You can also say “Alexa, pause” and “Alexa, resume.”

We'd love to hear from you! If you have questions or feedback, please e-mail digital@newarkpostonline.com.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
